videos.title: Tutorial video
videos.description: Video tutorial can be on any technical aspect of creating and deploying a dapp to Loom. It should be accessible to someone who has a beginner to intermediate level of experience with development. A great tutorial will explain each step in detail so viewers leave with a better understanding of how to interact with Loom.

videos.title: Non-technical video
videos.description: You have creative freedom, but the video should for example talk about where the value of Loom Network is, what the benefits of Loom are, etc. A successful video will go beyond the surface level (Loom is an interoperable solution) and should leave the viewer with a newly gained appreciation for Loom.

articles.title: Building an app with Unity
articles.description: Write a detailed and high quality article that explains how to build a dapp using Unity from scratch to end product.

articles.title: Using the Loom Transfer Gateway
articles.description: Write a detailed and high quality article that explains how to use the Loom Transfer Gateway. Tutorial should be accessible to someone who has gone through the CryptoZombies.io course and has beginning level experience with blockchain.

articles.title: Using Solidity for Loom
articles.description: Write a detailed and high quality article explaining how to use Solidity for Loom, with special emphasis on the steps needed to develop for Loom compared to Ethereum.

articles.title: Deploying a dapp to Loom
articles.description: Write a detailed and high quality article explaining how to deploy a dapp to Loom, with each step clearly explained. The article should show how to take a ready made dapp for Ethereum and deploy it to Loom.

articles.title: Non-technical article
articles.description: Write a detailed and high quality article explaining what Loom is. You have creative control, but the article should for example talk about where the value of Loom Network is, what the benefits of Loom are. A successful article should leave the reader with a newly gained appreciation for Loom.
